game.title: The Lost Scrolls
game.objective: Find and return three scrolls that were stolen from the Temple of Knowledge.
game.description: The scrolls contain ancient knowledge that is vital to the survival of the world. They must be retrieved before they fall into the wrong hands.
game.reward: A powerful magical artifact that will help you on your journey.

task.objective: Travel to the Temple of Knowledge and investigate the theft.
task.description: The temple is located in the mountains to the east. Speak to the monks there and see if they have any information about the scrolls.

task.objective: Find the thieves who stole the scrolls.
task.description: The thieves are a group of bandits who operate out of a hideout in the forest. Track them down and retrieve the scrolls.

task.objective: Return the scrolls to Archmage Rieldir.
task.description: Once you have the scrolls, return to Archmage Rieldir at the Tower of Mysteries. He will be grateful for your help and will reward you.
